1.name: Seda Miroyan
1.paragraph: A school that teaches new skills, new knowledge, new approaches, approaches each student in its own way. A place where knowledgeable professionals work, sparing no effort to impart their knowledge to their students. And yes, the visits to different institutions outside of classes and within the framework of classes, there is no question, are held at a high level. Thank you, all of youüòçüòçüòç

2.name: Margarita Khojoyan
2.paragraph: Thanks to KY academy. Wonderful school, wonderful teachers, program, approach..... Everything is of such a high level and quality that you don't even know what to say üëçüëçüëç During their attendance, the children learned so many interesting things that even many, many adults wouldn't be bothered to know In short, we recommend it to everyone üëç

3.name: Hovhannes Khacheryan
3.paragraph: I want to thank the best teachers of KY academy for interesting courses, thematic gatherings and a good environment. Everything starts with education

4.name: Alla Grigoryan
4.paragraph: I definitely recommend attending KY academy , in a short time they teach skills that cannot be learned either at school, on the street, or at home, children get financial knowledge from an early age, learn to work in a team, and know success many secrets to achieve.

5.name: Gayane Movsesyan
5.paragraph: As a result of studying at KY academy for two years, my child was able to start his own business, earn money for the first time, and also initiate an important educational program. Thank you very much to the school staff and I definitely recommend the school if you want your child to gain really useful knowledge and skills that will be a lifelong companion. Special thanks to Lilit Vatoyan, founder of the school, for her dedicated and professional work. It's never too early

partners.title: Partners
partners.paragraph: Become a Partner of KY academy and let's go together to a colorful new reality. By becoming a member of the KY family, you will enter a modern and unique world. We are always open for interesting proposals and cooperations.

team.title: Our Team
team.pretitle: Behind every success is a Strong Team

balt.paragraph: It all started with my visit to the Greater Baltic States in 2016. I traveled to Latvia, Lithuania and Estonia on an exchange program to introduce Armenia, including our culture, customs and life, to the local youth

balttw.paragraph: Communicating with young people and learning about the educational systems of each country for six months, I realized that a lot of attention is paid to non-formal education, especially to raising the level of financial literacy among children and young people. Then I also visited Finland and studied the educational approaches of the Finns. They used gamified educational methods when working with students of any age, which gave very high results

open.paragraph: And it was there that the idea arose to open a school in Armenia that would give our children and young people the opportunity to acquire such knowledge and skills, which, unfortunately, are not provided either in public schools or in non-formal educational institutions. Returning to Armenia, I collected the curricula of international business schools, studied all Armenian financial platforms, consulted with psychologists and experts in the field, and one year later, in 2019, the first curriculum was created

two.paragraph: At the first reception of KY academy, we had only two registrants. The disappointment was quite big, I even thought that I made a wrong decision and my initiative was not appreciated in Armenia. However, what was started had to be finished, and we started the course with only two students. By the end of the program, many people had already heard about us, and when I was thinking about taking a break, I received many calls to join our course. And so our activities continued until today

conn.paragraph: We already have more than 150 graduates, more than 100 current students, more than 50 successful business projects and more than 50 partners throughout Armenia. At the time of the establishment of the school, I was both a trainer, and a financier, and a marketer, and a sales specialist, and a cleaner, and... and now we are one big team, one big family with the same vision to provide our children and students with all the knowledge and skills possible to succeed in the 21st century. It's never too soon
